price: 215. Oo u raarici garabkaaga ciddii ku raacda ee ka mid ah mu’miiinta.
arabic: وَٱخۡفِضۡ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ikh'fiḍ janāḥaka limani ittabaʿaka mina al-mu'minīna
